00009     public class ListElement : UIElement

00012         private List<ListItem> items;

00015         public ListElement()
00016         {
00017             this.items = new List<ListItem>();
00018             this.border = new Border();            
00019         }
00020 
00021         public Border Border
00022         {
00023             get
00024             {
00025                 return this.border;
00026             }
00027         }

00029         public List<ListItem> Items
00030         {
00031             get
00032             {

00037         protected override void OnRender(Graphics graphics)
00038         {
00039             this.LayoutItems();
00040             this.border.Render(graphics);           
00041 
00042             for (int i = 0; i < this.items.Count; i++)
00043             {
00044                 this.items[i].Render(graphics);
00045             }            
00046         }
00047 
00048         private void LayoutItems()
00049         {
00050             this.border.Left = this.Left;
00051             this.border.Top = this.Top;
00052             this.border.Width = this.Width;
00053             this.border.Height = this.Height;
00054             int height = this.Top;
00055             foreach (ListItem item in this.items)
00056             {                
00057                 item.Left = this.left;               
00058                 item.Top += height;
00059                 height = item.Height;
00060             }
00061         }
